snippet: The attack, which came as the official was entertaining visitors, was the most high-profile political assassination in Pakistan this year.
abstract: Suicide bomber kills a senior provincial official Israr Gandapur and at least nine guests at his home in northwestern Pakistan, in the most high-profile political assassination by Islamist insurgency there in 2013.

byline.original: By ISMAIL KHAN and DECLAN WALSH
byline.contributor: Ismail Khan reported from Peshawar, and Declan Walsh from London. Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan.

lead_paragraph: The attack, which came as the official was entertaining visitors, was the most high-profile political assassination in Pakistan this year.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber in Pakistan Kills a Provincial Official
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomber in Pakistan Kills a Provincial Official
